page.description: The data source for the FormView control. You can select a List control, a Javascript object, or other controls on a UX that would typically be hidden.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Datasource type]* defines how the FormView control is populated. The data source can be one of the following:

description.p: The FormView is populated from a List control. The FormView displays the data for the selected record in the List.
A JavaScript function computes the data to display. The JavaScript function must return a JSON object.
If using this option, you can specify sample data that defines the expected data source format. The sample data is required in order to define a Layout for the FormView control.
The FormView is populated from one or more controls in the UX component. The UX controls are often hidden when used to populate the FormView.
The FormView is populated using Static JSON. The JSON is defined in the FormView's *[ui:Static JSON]* property.
Custom is listed but currently cannot be configured. It will be implemented or removed at a later date.
